content: cables and moss sport weight watch cap by kathryn mcconaghie mcconaghiek@gmail com similar construction and size as the original cables and moss watch cap pattern except this hat is worked in sport weight yarn and is designed to be reversible needles 3 5 mm us 4 16 circular and set of five double pointed needles dpns 2 cable needles yarn sport weight 190 yds 50 g juniper moon farm patagonia half skein gauge 25 sts/40 rnds over 4 worked in moss stitch finished hat measurements 10-3/4 tall uncuffed 16 circumference cabled cuff unstretched 19 circumference moss stitch top unstretched note to make a different size or use a different weight yarn choose a cast on divisible by both 6 and 8 for example 72 96 120 144 or 168 sts chart a cuff key to chart symbols and abbreviations  ɣ  ɣ  6 k knit  ɣ  ɣ  5 p purl  ɣ  ɣ  4 ktbl twisted knit knit through the back loop  ɣ  ɣ  3 twisted 3-stitch st cable  ɣ  ɣ  2 with center purl − place 1st st knit on cable needle  ɣ  ɣ  1 cn and hold to front − place 2nd st purl on another cn 6 5 4 3 2 1 and hold to back − k1tbl 3rd st next st knit on left decreasing techniques hand needle lhn k2tog knit next two sts together − purl st on back cn ssp slip 1st st knitwise slip 2nd st − ktbl st on front cn knitwise replace both sts on lhn purl the 2 sts together through the back loop cables and moss - sport weight watch cap-20220124-draft 1 directions cast on 120 sts and join to work in the round place marker for beginning of round bor work chart a five 5 times then work rnds 1 and 2 of chart a one more time for 3-1/2 10 cm work rnds 3 and 4 of chart b one time then work chart b twelve 12 times for 8-1/2 22 cm from cast on edge end after completing a round 4 of chart on final round set markers for 8 decrease sections of 15 sts each work the following rnds 4 times or until there are 7 sts between markers 56 sts total round 1 *k1 p1 to within 3 st of marker k1 k2tog p1 k1 to within 3 st of next marker p1 ssp notes on working decreases repeat from * around use a unique bor marker then round 2 *k1 p1 to within 2 st of marker k2 use 2 colors and alternate them p1 k1 to within 2 st of next marker p2 as you place them repeat from * around round 3 *p1 k1 to within 2 st of marker ssp slip markers as you come to k1 p1 to within 2 st of next marker k2tog them repeat from * around change to dpns
